content: **crochet drops jacket in highlander with decorative edges in snow ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **size** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** drops cloud from garnstudio colour no 09 petrol 550-600-650-700-800-850 g or use drops highlander from garnstudio colour no 06 dark blue 550-600-650-700-800-850 g and use drops snow from garnstudio color no 40 brown mix 100 g for all sizes drops crochet hook size 8 mm / l or the crochet hook size needed to obtain correct crochet gauge drops dark buffalo horn button no 536 5-6-6-6-6-7 pcs
